data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Communities facing these challenges include developing countries, indigenous groups, the handicapped and the elderly. Stakeholders ____ non-governmental ____ can ____ these ____ needs ____ often ____ the ____ expertise ____ facilities ____ solve ____. Local entrepreneurs with innovative solutions often lack the expertise to implement solutions and commercialize them on a large scale.
data.partBlankContent: Communities facing these challenges include developing countries, indigenous groups, the handicapped and the elderly. Stakeholders a__ non-governmental organi_______ can artic_____ these comm_____ needs b__ often la__ the tech_____ expertise a__ facilities t_ solve th__. Local entrepreneurs with innovative solutions often lack the expertise to implement solutions and commercialize them on a large scale.
data.answer: 面临这些挑战的社区包括发展中国家、土著群体、残疾人和老年人。利益攸关方和非政府组织可以阐明这些最普遍的需求，但往往缺乏解决这一问题的技术、专门知识和设施。具有创新解决方案的当地企业家往往缺乏实施解决方案和将其大规模商业化的专门知识。
